description.full: Welcome to Williams Pinball Classics!  Universally acclaimed as the best pinball videogame in existence, Williams Pinball Classics serves up 13 of the most popular Williams tables of all time!  Every texture, every flashing light and every sound effect has been lovingly recreated in order to deliver the most accurate, photorealistic simulation of the classic pastime.   Unrivalled ball physics mean that you can become just as good as you always were. And that classic addictive gameplay means newcomers will be hooked from the first ball!
description.short: Universally acclaimed as the best pinball videogame in existence, Williams Pinball Classics serves up 13 of the most popular Williams tables of all time!
